title: IIFE format does not expose named defaults when moduleName contains multiple parts
body:
If you go to https://rollupjs.org/repl, select the _Named Exports_ example, switch the format to `iife`, and add a `.` to the module name (e.g. `myModule.subModule`), the `return exports;` statement at the end of the generated bundle is removed.

This is not an issue if there is only a `default export`, but shows up when named exports are in use (whether there is a `default export` or not).

An example is https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.45.2&
